channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Cuomo Tries to Tie Mamdani to Muslim Leader’s Anti-Gay Stance

item.title: The Spritzes and Carbonaras That Ate Italy
item.description: Tourism has turned some Italian streets into monochromatic eating zones. Some officials have banned the opening of new restaurants.

item.title: Why are so many rich Americans investing in British soccer teams?
item.description: American millionaires and celebrities are buying up British soccer teams in record numbers.

item.title: Sea Otters Are Stealing Surfboards in Santa Cruz. Again.
item.description: Two years after Otter 841 menaced wave riders near Santa Cruz, there have been new encounters between the furry marine mammals and surfers.

item.title: Opinion: Susan Stamberg gave NPR its voice

item.title: Photos: Scenes from the No Kings Protests
item.description: People gathered for pro-democracy protests across the country today.

item.title: Large Fire Disrupts Flights at Bangladesh’s Main Airport
item.description: The blaze drew dozens of firefighting units, with military help. Officials said they could not yet specify what caused it.
